title: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654Modify Parameters: Dialog details duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page. The first and second column could be merged.
OB: The preview is cut off when changing a param name to something very long.
EB: The preview should display the full name of the parameter without being cut off.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Modify Parameters dialog.
2. Change the name of a parameter to something very long.
3. Observe that the preview is cut off.
